title: Mine to Take: A Tale of Forbidden Happily Ever After
description: This book does deal with rape and physical abuse.KIRSTENHe rescued me from a gang rape and my abusive husband.He quotes classic American literature to me, brings me small gifts from his out-of-town trips. We share dinner together each night in the library of his home. We laugh, play cards, discuss books and music.And each night ends the same, his arms wrapped securely around me.It’s all wonderful and comfortable and perfect, except for one thing.He’s a terrorist and he’s holding me under lock and key, and I feel safer here with him than I did in my own home with my husband.FARIDI’m not a good man. I’ve done horrible things and hurt more people than I can count. But I’ve not orchestrated anywhere near the amount of devastation I’ve been accused of.She can make me a better man. She already has.I’m captivated by her spirit and complete and total lack of fear around me.But loving her puts her life at risk and that I can’t handle. Living without her? I’m not sure I can handle that either. So just how far am I willing to go to be with her?This is forbidden love, dangerous romance, with a sweet underlying love story and, of course, a HEA.
author: Skylar Platt
